DURING ACTIVATION OF NLFS (EDR150) THE FLW CHANGES TO MAPCH PROC OCCUR: CROSS TD004 AT OR ABOVE 4000. MINIMUM MISSED APPROACH CLIMB GRADIENT IS 4.6 PERCENT (280FT/NM) UNTIL PASSING 4000. REF AIP PAGES AD 2 EDTD 4-6-1 DATED 25 FEB 2021.

DURING ACTIVATION OF NLFS (EDR150) THE FLW CHANGES TO STAR OCCUR: NATOR4D: AMEND MNM IFR CRUSING LEVEL BETWEEN NATOR AND XIBUD TO READ 7500. EMKIL2D: AMEND MNM IFR CRUSING LEVEL BETWEEN EMKIL AND ALUVI TO READ 6700. REF AIP PAGES AD 2 EDTD 3-1-1 EFF 01 MAY 2014, 3-1-2 DATED 23 MAY 2019.

NOISE ABATEMENT PROCEDURES - NEW RESTRICTIONS : -NO CHAPTER 3 AIRCRAFT WHOSE CUMULATIVE MARGIN IS LESS THAN 13 EPNDB MAY : -LAND OR PUSH BACK BETWEEN 2000 AND 2200 -LAND BETWEEN 0300 AND 0400. REGARDLESS OF ITS CUMULATIVE MARGIN. -NO AIRCRAFT MAY CARRY OUT A SCHEDULED DEPARTURE BETWEEN 2100 AND 2200 EXCEPT FOR COMMERCIAL FLIGHTS DELAYED FOR REASONS BEYOND THE CONTROL OF THE CARRIER. -THE AIR CARRIER WILL PROVIDE WITHIN 48HR TO THE CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITIES THE DETAILS OF THE REASONS FOR THE DELAY OF THE FLIGHTS OPERATED. -ANY REFERENCE TO A DEPARTURE TIME SHALL BE UNDERSTOOD AS A PUSHBACK TIME FROM THE ACFT STAND. -REF : AD2 LFSB AD 2.21 AUGUST 06 2021 DECREE.
